A magical snowman who comes to life and goes on a journey to find his lost carrot nose, meeting various winter creatures along the way.
A snowman who, instead of coming to life, becomes the catalyst for a group of children to learn about the science of snow and ice.
A snowman who, after coming to life, becomes a mentor to a young boy struggling with bullying at school.
A snowman who, instead of going on a journey, becomes the star of a comedy sketch show, with each episode featuring a new and hilarious situation.
A snowman who, after coming to life, discovers he has the power to control the weather and uses it to help those in need.
